title: John Pizzarelli - 1990 - My Blue Heaven (2003 HDTracks 24 96) FL
description:
John Pizzarelli - 1990 - My Blue Heaven (2003)
HDTracks 24 bits 96 KHz

Just prior to signing with RCA/Novus, John Pizzarelli recorded two sets for Chesky that featured him playing in the swing style that he would soon make quite popular. Although joined by all-stars (pianist Dave McKenna, bassist Milt Hinton, drummer Connie Kay, his father, guitarist Bucky Pizzarelli, and flugelhornist Clark Terry) rather than his regular trio, Pizzarelli's likable vocals and relaxed guitar solos are not overshadowed. In fact, this is a delightful date, with memorable renditions of such songs as "I'm An Errand Boy for Rhythm," "Lady Be Good," "The Best Man," "Gee Baby Ain't I Good to You" and "Candy." Easily recommended to John Pizzarelli fans. (AllMusic)

Track list:

02 - I'm An Errand Boy For Rhythm

05 - The Touch Of Your Lips
06 - Can't Take You Nowhere
07 - Take My Smile
08 - That's What
09 - Stray Horn
10 - Best Man
11 - Oh Me, Oh My, Oh Gosh
12 - Don't Get Around Much Anymore
13 - Gee Baby Ain't I Good To You
14 - Passion Flower
15 - Zoot Walked In/Morning Fun
16 - Candy
